channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kentucky to consider bill that would hold parents accountable for children’s gun crimes
item.description: Kentucky lawmakers will reportedly consider legislation directly connecting parents to the gun crimes of their children.

item.title: Stuck in a Rut? Be Social — and Stay Local
item.description: Focusing on joyful pursuits with others helped me fall back in love with my hometown.

item.title: The Destruction Of A Beloved New York Choir School Epitomizes The Fall Of The Episcopal Church
item.description: The dismantling of the St. Thomas Choir School is not merely a governance decision; it is an act of cultural desecration.

item.title: Faith shaped Jimmy Carter's presidency and the decades of public life that followed
item.description: Jimmy Carter, the 39th president of the United States who died Sunday at age 100, may well be remembered as much for his faith as for his politics.

item.title: Animosity Against Jews Demonstrates Leftist Icon Greta Thunberg’s Extremism
item.description: Thunberg has translated her climate stardom to highlight something she cares about more than the planet these days: attacking Israel.

item.description: The truth is that historians have not been harsh enough.
